description:
Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf`s Sheepy Little Detective is the 15th instalment of the Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf series. 
The Little Detective of the Sheep and Goat takes a rare approach to the theme of suspense and deduction, allowing the wolf and sheep to transform into detectives to continue their battle of wits and courage in the show. The show`s creative team mentioned, "This is a brand new attempt in the Pleasant Goat series to bring in practical life knowledge through tense and exciting cases, so that viewers can think during the process of solving the case, but also get joy from the progress of the plot." This drama combines deduction, mystery solving and suspense, with wonderful scientific knowledge, magical natural phenomena, rich life knowledge coming out in endless layers, suspense and laughter bombardment .
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊羊小侦探

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Yang Yang Xiao Zhentan
